Reviews.Title: “ONE thumb up!”
Reviews.Author: Mistletoe77
Reviews.Content: nice modern hotel cheap price online little bit 5th avenue night 7 minutes walk dimly lit neighborhood free breakfast buffet toasts eggs chilaquiles waffles cereals fresh fruits yogurt clean quiet cable tv nice helpful staff computers lobby street distance bus terminal

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - modern but inexpensive, and quiet!”
Reviews.Author: 2TravellingCanucks
Reviews.Content: stayed jan 2011 7 months modern located short distance main strip quiet free internet free breakfast included breakfast usual local fare fruit toast chilaquiles beans waffles etc beds comfortable bathrooms modern clean tapas kiddy corner hotel ado bus station easy fares online offer walk check similar sites prices oh free laundry facilities recommending friends wedding playa

Reviews.Title: “Basic and economical, clean with a few nice amenities”
Reviews.Author: neuatomic
Reviews.Content: appears brand hotel future condo complex construction lobby breakfast clean basic queen sized bed shelf served desk closet sorts flatscreen tv walls stark white bathroom nicely sized nice tiles walls shower granite counter top free wifi throughout 4 blocks main drag ave 5 playa 5 6 blocks beach walmart block south block north literally 5 min walk action tho little bus stations playa door didnt hear noise bothered nonresort style clean cheap accomodation theres complain breakfast included

Reviews.Title: “A Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: MeliQ
Reviews.Content: hotel located near beach located directly ado bus station serves cancun etc cabs playa expensive walk heat cab beach day bad esepcially taking buses throughout roo location noise bus station notice 106 breakfast offered morning breakfast bad offered eggs ceral toast chilaquiles 7am 11am front desk staff helpful computers available lobby internet king bed comfortable clean bathroom clean offered soap shampoo etc closet desk tv night stay traveling towards cancun nice stay 45usd total
